Deficiency Narrative: It was determined that an adult in care is sharing a bedroom with a child younger than 24 months.
Correction Narrative: As per the CEO/Executive Director, the operation has assigned Program Director to ensure that any adult resident in care will not share a room with any child at any time whose age difference exceeds 24 months.

Deficiency Narrative: One of two staff files did not have a required drug test. One staff file had a drug test months after hire date.
Correction Narrative: As per the CEO/Executive Director, the operation has assigned the HR Coordinator to ensure that all applicants prior to being hired will have passed pre-employment drug testing with the results of the testing documented.

Deficiency Narrative: One of two staff files did not have documented employment verification and both files did not have reference checks.
Correction Narrative: As per the CEO/Executive Director, the operation has assigned the HR Coordinator to ensure the organization remains in compliance with the minimum standards. Employment verification will be documented, and the information will be written for each reference checked and noted on TPLCOH employment verification form.

Deficiency Narrative: Two of two staff files did not have the required document.
Correction Narrative: As per the CEO/Executive Director, the operation designated the HR Coordinator to ensure the organization remains in compliance with minimum standards. Form 2912 has been added to TPLCOH new hire packet.  All new hires will be required to complete before employment is confirmed and begun.  Additionally, each current employee has completed form 2912 and a copy has been placed in their employee binder.

Deficiency Narrative: Two of two staff members did not have the required childcare experience. Both staff did not have the required shadowing of another caretaker.
Correction Narrative: As per the CEO/Executive Director, the operation's HR Coordinator has ensured that all personnel have a minimum of 40 hours on-site training and shadowing within the facility of TPLCOH. These hours have been documented as training on our schedules.  Going forward the HR Coordinator will ensure that pre-service training/shadowing will be documented on the provide tracking document for all new hires prior to being alone with children in our care. Schedules provided showing training onsite hours.

Deficiency Narrative: Two of two staff files did not have the training instructor-led requirements relating to psychotropic medication training. Two or two staff files did not have any evaluation and/or assessments relating to EBI trainings.
Correction Narrative: As per the CEO/Executive Director, the operation has designated the LCCA/Administrator to ensure that all personnel who administer medications will receive instructor-led training by licensed personnel from the pharmacy used by the operation prior to being entrusted with those responsibilities. The Pharmacist of Record has scheduled training with TPLCOH personnel dated 06/03/2025. Documentation will be provided upon completion of training.

Deficiency Narrative: Two of two staff files reviewed not have any training related to any type of emergencies and/or communicable diseases.
Correction Narrative: As per the CEO/Executive Director, the operation's Administrator has delegated the HR Coordinator/Training Coordinator, to ensure that all pre-service and annual trainings include signature pages, and post-test documentation to convey understanding of the information following trainings. The HR Coordinator will conduct CQI assessments monthly to ensure all employees have satisfied these requirements.

Deficiency Narrative: The thermometer is both the freezer and refrigerator are not fuctioning.
Correction Narrative: The Pride Lands Center of Hope shall designate Abram Chizer  Staff Supervisor to ensure the organization remains in compliance with minimum standards.  A daily log sheet has been created and is prominently displayed for staff once a day to log the thermometer reading of both the freezer and the refrigerator.

Deficiency Narrative: The operations health inspection has expired.
Correction Narrative: The Pride Lands Center of Hope shall designate Thurman Outley  Program Director to ensure the organization remains in compliance in ensuring sanitation inspection will be conducted at least once every 12 months. Mr. Outley will conduct quarterly checks and will schedule an Sanitation inspection at least 30 days prior to expiration to ensure any deficiencies can be addressed prior to the current certificates expiration

Deficiency Narrative: During the physical walkthrough the freezer was observed to not have a thermometer. This was corrected at site by a staff member going to purchase a thermometer.

The restraint report reviewed did not state what type of EBI was used. The form is also missing the person who performed the restraint, attempts to explain to the child what behaviors were necessary for release from the intervention, the actions the caregiver(s) took to facilitate the childs return to normal activities following the end of the intervention, If personal restraint is used, documentation must also include the specific restraint techniques used, including a prone or supine restraint used as a transitional hold.
Correction Narrative: Pride Lands Center of Hope will document a restraint report along with a serious incident report. The restraint report will include the person who performed the restraint, attempts to explain to the child what behaviors were necessary for release from the intervention, the actions the caregiver(s) took to facilitate the childs return to normal activities following the end of the intervention. The restraint report will also indicate what type of restraint technique was performed.
